content:
alexcrichton opened PR #12081 from alexcrichton:disable-async to bytecodealliance:main:

This is causing failures due to #11954 so to help unblock fuzzing just disable async for now.

alexcrichton commented on PR #12081:

I'm gonna temporarily hold off on this due to https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime/issues/11954#issuecomment-3571830320, but will check back in later.

pchickey edited PR #12081:

This is causing failures due to #11954 so to help unblock fuzzing just disable sync for now.
